cast.name: 香特尔·阿克曼 Chantal Akerman

director.name: 奥古斯丁·门迪拉哈苏 Agustín Mendilaharzu
阿列霍·莫吉兰斯基 Alejo Moguillansky
奥古斯丁·罗兰代利 Agustín Rolandelli
马里亚诺·利纳斯 Mariano Llinás

introduction: In the first days of April 2005, Chantal Akerman traveled to Buenos Aires invited by Malba to accompany the presentation of her video installation D'est; al borde de la ficción and personally supervise its montage.The installation was also accompanied by the first retrospective of the filmmaker made in Latin America: a total of 23 films, beginning with her first experimental short films and ending with her recent autobiography, Chantal Akerman by Chantal Akerman.Finally, on Saturday, April 9, she was interviewed by Adrián Cangi and held an open chat with the public, in which she reviewed different aspects of her work.This film is a summary of those three events.
